name: Mini Tale - Dark Maze
description:
Mini Tale - Dark Maze is a choice driven image adventure game in which you are destined to fail.

Inside the mysterious dark maze full of fatal danger and merciless monsters, you are struggling to escape unharmed. Hesitation is meaningless, fear gives you nothing but death, what you can do is to try bravely until you finally reach the freedom again.

Totally 50 endings are included, however only very few of them are happy ones. Try and you'll know.
